CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aceragen Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company committed to transforming the care of people living with rare pulmonary and rheumatic diseases. The company portfolio includes late-stage programs based on well-established biological principles that are developing to be innovative therapeutics capable of addressing the unmet medical needs of individuals living with rare diseases.
